rules_text:
First strike, reach
[i]Fortune's Favor[/i] – Whenever you attack, for each opponent you attacked this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play cards exiled this way for as long as they remain exiled, and may spend mana as though it was any color to cast those spells.
[i]Fierce Rival[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from exile, Selena, Bow Knight deals 3 damage to each opponent.
Partner with Odin, Sorcerer
